forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 7C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 44F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 26F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the evening, otherwise a good deal of clouds. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: On and off snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 32F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
